name: Unicorn Dream
description:
A lonely Unicorn dreams colorful dreams, they are beautiful and filled with living colors, but one day his dreams are invaded by nightmares and to wake up, he needs to fly all the way from the beginning of the dream to its end, avoiding enemies, collecting dolls of missing children and making his way forward.

Unicorn Dream - runner and side-scroller shooter. You control a comical unicorn that in your dreams flies through various obstacles, dodges vertical lightning, collects dolls of missing children, shoots ice cream and much more that only a unicorn can dream of!

Feature of game:
  • Increasing Difficulty
  • Beautiful Visual style
  • Pleasant music
